body_content.explanation: to read and understand written texts faster than normal, often using particular techniques (= methods) that can be learned:
examples: He published a paper reviewing what the latest science can tell us about attempts to speed read.
I read to 50% and speed read/skimmed the rest to see if I was missing out on a great read.
She just had time to speed-read the first Harry Potter novel before trying out for the part.

body_content.explanation: an act of reading and understanding a written text faster than normal, often using particular techniques (= methods) that can be learned:
examples: I bought a copy of the book and hurried back to the office for a speed read.

body_content.explanation: a piece of writing that is short and can be read and understood quickly and easily:
examples: In this speed read, learn the difference between 3G, 4G and 5G, and why it matters.
